com.adyen.core

Class PaymentRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyen.core.PaymentRequest

  • public class PaymentRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides means to initiate a payment request.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaymentRequest(Context context, PaymentRequestListener paymentRequestListener)
      Constructs the payment request for the general flow with default UI.
      PaymentRequest(Context context, PaymentRequestListener paymentRequestListener, PaymentRequestDetailsListener paymentRequestDetailsListener)
      Constructs the payment request for the advanced flow with your custom UI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancels the payment request.
      void deletePreferredPaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod, DeletePreferredPaymentMethodListener listener)
      Delete a preferred PaymentMethod.
      Amount getAmount()
      Get the payment Amount.
      java.lang.String getGenerationTime()
      Returns the generation time of the request.
      PaymentMethod getPaymentMethod()
      Returns the selected payment method.
      PaymentRequestListener getPaymentRequestListener()
      Returns the PaymentRequestListener that the PaymentRequest was initiated with.
      java.lang.String getPublicKey()
      Returns the public key that is needed to encrypt data.
      java.lang.String getShopperReference()
      Get the ShopperReference.
      void start()
      Starts the payment request.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaymentRequest

        public PaymentRequest(Context context,
                      PaymentRequestListener paymentRequestListener)
        Constructs the payment request for the general flow with default UI.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequestListener -

      • PaymentRequest

        public PaymentRequest(Context context,
                      PaymentRequestListener paymentRequestListener,
                      PaymentRequestDetailsListener paymentRequestDetailsListener)
        Constructs the payment request for the advanced flow with your custom UI.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequestListener - Listener that is notified for onPaymentDataRequested and onPaymentResult.
        paymentRequestDetailsListener - Advanced listener that is needed to use custom UI.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the payment request.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels the payment request.

      • getPaymentMethod

        public PaymentMethod getPaymentMethod()
        Returns the selected payment method. If this method is called prior to the selection of a payment method, it will return null.
        Returns:
        Payment method if already selected, otherwise null.

      • getPublicKey

        public java.lang.String getPublicKey()
        Returns the public key that is needed to encrypt data.
        Returns:
        public key as a string, if available.

      • getGenerationTime

        public java.lang.String getGenerationTime()
        Returns the generation time of the request.
        Returns:
        the generation time, if available.

      • getAmount

        public Amount getAmount()
        Get the payment Amount. If called before amount information is received, it will return null.
        Returns:
        payment amount

      • getShopperReference

        public java.lang.String getShopperReference()
        Get the ShopperReference.
        Returns:
        The shopper reference, if available.

      • getPaymentRequestListener

        public PaymentRequestListener getPaymentRequestListener()
        Returns the PaymentRequestListener that the PaymentRequest was initiated with.
        Returns:
        The PaymentRequestListener

      • deletePreferredPaymentMethod

        public void deletePreferredPaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod,
                                         DeletePreferredPaymentMethodListener listener)
        Delete a preferred PaymentMethod. This will remove the stored payment details from this shopper on the back-end.
        Parameters:
        paymentMethod - A reference to the PaymentMethod that should be removed. Must be a preferred PaymentMethod.
        listener - DeletePreferredPaymentMethodListener listener to get the result.
